languages.text: "А что так скромно? Назвались бы сразу святыми, на которых вся династия держится!"

traits.locale_text: "А что так скромно? Назвались бы сразу святыми, на которых весь корабль держится!"

languages.text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"
languages.original_text: "А что так скромно? Назвались бы сразу святыми, на которых вся династия держится!"

traits.locale_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"
"Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"
"Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"
"Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"
"Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"

languages.text: «¿Por qué detenerse ahí? ¡Ya puestos, podrían dárselas de santos y afirmar que el destino de toda la dinastía reposa sobre sus hombros!».
languages.original_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué detenerse ahí? ¡Ya puestos, podrían dárselas de santos y afirmar que el destino de toda la dinastía reposa sobre sus hombros!».

languages.text: 「なぜそこで止まる？あなた方は聖人を名乗り、王朝全体の運命はあなたたが背負っていると言った方がいい！」
languages.original_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜそこで止まる？あなた方は聖人を名乗り、王朝全体の運命はあなたたが背負っていると言った方がいい！」

languages.text: “你怎么不说了？你们还不如管自己叫活圣人呢！说整个王朝的命运就落在你们的肩上！”
languages.original_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"

traits.locale_text: “你怎么不说了？你们还不如管自己叫活圣人呢！说整个王朝的命运就落在你们的肩上！”

languages.text: "Warum damit aufhören? Ihr könnt Euch genauso gut als Heilige bezeichnen und behaupten, das Schicksal der ganzen Dynastie lastet auf Euren Schultern!"
languages.original_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum damit aufhören? Ihr könnt Euch genauso gut als Heilige bezeichnen und behaupten, das Schicksal der ganzen Dynastie lastet auf Euren Schultern!"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qu'il ne faut pas entendre ! Pour un peu, on croirait presque que vous êtes des saints dont dépend l'avenir de la dynastie tout entière ! »
languages.original_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qu'il ne faut pas entendre ! Pour un peu, on croirait presque que vous êtes des saints dont dépend l'avenir de la dynastie tout entière ! »

languages.text: "Neden bu kadarıyla yetiniyorsunuz? Kendinizi aziz ilan edip tüm hanedanlığın kaderinin sizin omuzlarında olduğunu da ilan edin bari!"
languages.original_text: "Why stop there? You might as well call yourselves saints and say the fate of the whole dynasty rests on your shoulders!"
